data: ETC CLOSED. Operational as a hospital.  The unit at JFK Hospital is now functioning as a full ETU. Was initially not intended as an Ebola treatment centre (closed 27/7/14). Re-established an interim isolation unit (9/8/14-28/8/14).
https://data.hdx.rwlabs.org/dataset/etc-overview-21-october; https://www.internationalsos.com/ebola/index.cfm?content_id=396&language_id=ENG; WHO Foreign Medical Teams International Response
The situation has stabilized in some areas and MSF has closed its Ebola treatment center in Telimélé, in the west of the country, after no new cases were reported for 21 days
No longer accepting. Expected to increase to 100 beds. To be re-located outside the township of Kenema

http://health.gov.sl/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/Ebola-Situation-Report_Vol-133.pdf; https://www.internationalsos.com/ebola/index.cfm?content_id=397&language_id=ENG; WHO Foreign Medical Teams International Response; WHO Data
name: Ebola - West Africa  - Ebola Treatment Centres, Isolation Wards Hospitals and Transit Centres
